data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Jhabua, Madhya Pradesh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhabua, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 11,275 believers in the county of Jhabua the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Jhabua, Madhya Pradesh, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,001,288, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bania Khedayata people.
the county of Jhabua has (about) 11,275 people who know Jesus, 12,437 people who know about him culturally, and 1,001,288 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, grace the churches in Jhabua, Madhya Pradesh, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Jhabua.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Jhabua
location.people_groups_list: Prabhu, Kachhia (Hindu traditions), Mochi (Muslim traditions), Bania Lad, Nayadi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Prabhu (23,000), Kachhia (Hindu traditions) (109,000), Mochi (Muslim traditions) (66,000), Bania Lad (131,000), Nayadi (85,000)
